verbose_text: Work by Liu et al. showed that the active form of vitamin D, 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D3 (1,25-D3) induces the generation of the mycobactericidal cathelicidin derived peptide LL-37 in human macrophages.
evidence: vitamin D, 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D3 (1,25-D3) induces the generation of the mycobactericidal cathelicidin
